thread.section_title: LockTite Storage Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of LockTite Storage | locktitestorage.com
thread.title: Shelley Leggio
thread.title_full: LockTite Storage reviewed by Shelley Leggio

author: Shelley Leggio
title: Shelley Leggio
text:
I deal with Moe at the Laporte LockTite location often. (The company I work for has several units at her location)
She is so professional and always will to accommodate in anyway she can.
I recommend LockTite Laporte and Moe Forshee to anyone that needs storage space whether it is short term or long term!
